src:
Kecewa, 6 Caketum Mundur dari KLB PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Enam dari sembilan calon ketua umum (caketum) PSSI yaitu Aven Hinelo, Yesaya Oktavianus, Fary Djemi Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Benny Erwin, dan Sarman El Hakim memilih mundur dari Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Keenamnya memutuskan untuk menarik diri setelah diusir oleh petugas keamanan dari ruangan kongres.
Sebelum diusir, keenamnya bersama dua caketum lainnya yaitu Arif Putra Wicaksono dan Rahim Soekasah hendak menghampiri delegasi FIFA dan AFC. Mereka ingin memberikan surat protes karena merasa kongres tidak sesuai dengan Statuta PSSI.
"Kami sudah deklarasi kemarin, kami membuat surat dan ingin memberikan ke FIFA dan AFC. Rundown kongres tidak seperti biasa. Tapi kan seolah-olah suasana dibikin seperti ribut," ujar Benny.
"Perwakilan kami, Pak Fary, mau berbicara ke FIFA dan AFC. Tapi tidak bisa. Dijaga petugas keamanan, lalu kami diusir," katanya menambahkan
Setelah keenamnya mundur, kongres kini menyisakan tiga caketum yaitu Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim, dan Arif. Adapun sebelum kongres dimulai, satu caketum lainnya yakni Bernhard Limbong telah menyatakan menarik diri.

text:
Disappointed, 6 Caketum withdrew from KLB PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Six of the nine PSSI candidates (caketum) namely Aven Hinelo, Isaiah Octavian, Fary Djemi Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Benny Erwin, and Sarman El Hakim chose to resign from the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri Hotel -La, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). The six decided to withdraw after being expelled by security officers from the congressional room.
Before being expelled, the six along with two other caketum namely Arif Putra Wicaksono and Rahim Soekasah wanted to approach the FIFA and AFC delegations. They wanted to give a letter of protest because they felt the congress was not in accordance with the PSSI Statute.
"We had a declaration yesterday, we made a letter and wanted to give it to FIFA and the AFC. Rundown congress was not as usual. But it was as if the atmosphere was made like a fuss," said Benny.
"Our representative, Mr. Fary, wants to talk to FIFA and the AFC. But we cannot. Guarded by security officers, we are then expelled," he added
After the sixth resignation, the congress now leaves three caketum namely Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim, and Arif. Before the congress began, another caketum, Bernhard Limbong, had declared to withdraw.

Read the next page, Bolaneters
